text: The 2015 Transplant Games (Spanish: Juegos Mundiales para Transplantados) were a multi-sport event held from 23 to 30 August 2015 in Mar del Plata, Argentina. They were the 20th edition of the World Transplant Games. The Games were organized by the World Transplant Games Federation (WTGF), the Ministry of Social Development and the Ministry of Health of Argentina. ==Participating nations== * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * ==Sports== * 18px Athletics * 18px Table Tennis * 18px Swimming * 18px Volleyball * 18px Triathlon * 18px Badminton * 18px Bowling * 18px Golf * 18px Squash * 18px Tennis * 18px Cycling * 18px Tejo * 18px Marathon (5 km) * 18px Pétanque ==Medal table== Medals were awarded to the following countries: ==See also== *2013 Youth Parapan American Games ==References== ==External links== * Official site Category:Multi-sport events in Argentina Category:Sport in Mar del Plata Category:Transplant Games Category:2015 in multi-sport events Category:2015 in Argentine sport Category:August 2015 sports events in South America
title: 2015 Summer Transplant Games
